For Milan the task is rather simple: win to go back top of the league after both Napoli and Roma lost 1-0 on Saturday. arts.ttl: Leao challenges kean for the goal in Milan – Fiorentina
arts.sum: Milan vs Fiorentina also means Rafael Leao against Moise Kean, two top players who share a common passion off the pitch: music. arts.ttl: Milan – Fiorentina: Leao ready to score while facing his friend Pioli
arts.sum: Until now, the AC Milan team of head coach Massimiliano Allegri has managed to cope without him, but given the injury crisis affecting the team, Rafael Leao now has the duty and responsibility to lead his teammates toward the top of the Serie A table. arts.ttl: AC Milan vs. Fiorentina: both need a response
arts.sum: This will be Stefano Pioli’s 500th Serie A match as a head coach: his record stands at 217 wins, 135 draws, and 147 defeats. For Stefano Pioli’s Fiorentina (the coach who led AC Milan to their last Scudetto) this is already a must-win: three draws so far leave the Viola desperate to finally claim three points.
